10827fa9-6bb8-4c44-94cf-4a34cfa9a039.title: Pizza Pork fatback, pesto, parmesan, and arugula
10827fa9-6bb8-4c44-94cf-4a34cfa9a039.itemDescription: Dough, cream sauce, fatback, pesto, arugula, parmesan, mozzarella, and hot chili peppers + sauce for crust.

c407a5c6-f5fa-446b-9749-ab2378e20fb0.title: Pizza Stracciatella with mushrooms, and arugula
c407a5c6-f5fa-446b-9749-ab2378e20fb0.itemDescription: Dough, tomato base, mushroom mix (champignons, oyster mushrooms, porcini mushrooms), arugula, mozzarella, stracciatella cheese, onion mix, and truffle oil + sauce for crust.

5ab13130-c082-4a3d-b3b1-2417a37638a3.title: Pizza Lamb polpette with baked peppers, and tomatoes
5ab13130-c082-4a3d-b3b1-2417a37638a3.itemDescription: Dough, tomato sauce, minced lamb (with pine nuts), mozzarella cheese, onion mix, baked peppers, zira (cumin), and olive oil + sauce for bumpers.

33c089d8-4498-4c30-a99d-fc4285662797.title: Lemon Tart
33c089d8-4498-4c30-a99d-fc4285662797.itemDescription: Shortcrust dough, lemon souffle, and passion fruit sauce.

5a1913b2-aad1-4e92-8bb2-8b5ed3f35411.title: Pizza Burrata with tomatoes
5a1913b2-aad1-4e92-8bb2-8b5ed3f35411.itemDescription: Dough, tomato sauce, stracciatella cheese, dried cherries, basil, and olive oil + sauce for crust.

d8d556fb-dd41-4b86-b4e3-193350379b9e.title: Salad with trout, quinoa, and tomatoes
d8d556fb-dd41-4b86-b4e3-193350379b9e.itemDescription: Lettuce mix (arugula, spinach), boiled black quinoa, fresh trout, avocado, tomatoes (pink, yellow), and sorghum sauce (olive-lemon).

ebe36290-0b2c-474b-8e94-e760b5bd1ba3.title: Pizza Four cheese, and spicy honey
ebe36290-0b2c-474b-8e94-e760b5bd1ba3.itemDescription: Dough, cream sauce, mozzarella, parmesan, dorblu, and pecorino + spicy honey (served separately).

a851b23b-88f2-4442-95a7-015ba679c100.title: Pizza Margarita
a851b23b-88f2-4442-95a7-015ba679c100.itemDescription: Dough, tomato sauce, buffalo mozzarella, basil, and olive oil + sauce for crust.

a5054242-0a0a-4326-b9ff-1a184b6b8e58.title: Friedman pizza
a5054242-0a0a-4326-b9ff-1a184b6b8e58.itemDescription: Тісто, томатна основа, моцарела, салямі Мілано, баклажан (смажений), сушений базилік, пекоріно, оливкова олія, чорний перець + соус для бортиків.

8c6fa3f7-031c-4786-a72b-a808cbe854a5.title: Chicken liver pate with truffle honey
8c6fa3f7-031c-4786-a72b-a808cbe854a5.itemDescription: Homemade chicken liver pate served with caramelized onions and truffle honey. Ciabatta, hazelnuts, and microgreens.

e9e280bb-0f57-48d2-9e68-2dbee112079c.title: Pizza Chanterelle mushrooms with porcini mushrooms, and spinach
e9e280bb-0f57-48d2-9e68-2dbee112079c.itemDescription: Dough, cream sauce, mozzarella, chanterelles, porcini mushrooms, spinach, dried cherry, onion mix, and olive oil + sauce for crust.

68a4697f-3f39-473b-967f-d3e07c17b4b4.title: Carrot cake
68a4697f-3f39-473b-967f-d3e07c17b4b4.itemDescription: Carrot sponge cake, caramel impregnation, mascarpone cream, and nuts.

1afc674d-aea0-4bd0-a394-f23a5143ba5c.title: Pizza Spicy peperonata with salami, and fennel
1afc674d-aea0-4bd0-a394-f23a5143ba5c.itemDescription: Dough, tomato sauce, baked peppers, Nduja mince (salami, chorizo, parma, mortadella, hot peppers, garlic), fennel, and hot red peppers (dried) + sauce for crust.

2400e841-2d43-4a53-b61b-1e41b349528f.title: Green salad with avocado, zucchini, and wild mustard
2400e841-2d43-4a53-b61b-1e41b349528f.itemDescription: Honey, and mustard dressing, onions, and walnuts.

1f40c1ec-3a8d-4b89-9419-919d8997b822.title: Pizza Light-salted salmon, fennel, and cream cheese
1f40c1ec-3a8d-4b89-9419-919d8997b822.itemDescription: Dough, cream and tomato sauce, light-salted salmon, red onions, fennel, cream cheese, and dill sauce + sauce for crust.
